string.name: about
string.b: ReferMe, powered by KamikazeStudios. , Easy to understand. All you need to do is refer two or more users to join the train of income earners. Evidently, The value of the ReferMe train is the User base. The more you refer, the more you earn. Register with just $20 dollars and on each of your downlines, you get and impressive 50% ROI.

string.name: about1
string.b: There is minimum risk of losing income as earnings on each downline are received on the point of registration. So what are you waiting for? get someone to join the train and let\'s earn

string.name: info
string.i: a code has been sent to your email. Log on to your email to complete process
